name: ABC 20
keyboard: QWERTY, mechanical keyboardFunction keys, arrow keys and numeric keypad
ports: SIO : (RS232, current, TTL) : 2 chanelsPIO : (TTL) : 8bits x 2 portsIEEE
description:
There were several models : 20, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25 and 26. The Model 2x was the successor of the ABC 10, which had a digital tape auxillary memory, supplied with DOSKET-T. 
 
A lot of languages were developed for these computers: 
- Dosket : Fortran IV, Basic, Cobol, Macro Assembler.
- CP/M : MBasic, CBasic, Pascal, Cobol 80, Fortran 80, PL/3, etc.

(AI DOSKET is the AI Electronics Operating System.)
peripherals: Winchester type disk memoryDigital cassette tape (3 units)Floppy disk (2 units)Light PenColor DisplayPrinterGraphic printerXY Plotter
